sys_hub_flow.description:
The flow shows an implementation of Box actions for creating a user in Box when a ServiceNow user is added to a particular group.

Trigger: The flow is triggered every time a record is created in the the Group Member table and the Group Name is Box User.

Flow Steps:

  1. Create User: The step Creates a User in Box using Create User action. The user details are retrieved from the user reference record from the Group Member table.
  2. Look up Folder ID: The step retrieves an ID of the common folder to which the user will be given access to.
  3. Add Collaborator: The step adds the user created as a collaborator for a common folder which can be of the team or company.
  4. Incidents are created in case a failure occurs during execution of any steps.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
